title: Lifting patients. Part 2. In the home
creator_contributor_role: Great Britain. Ministry of Health, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Spine - Wounds and Injuries
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Lifting and carrying
description: Demonstrates lifting techniques and explains the principle on which they are based, which removes the possibility of spinal injuries and strain. Primarily for district nurses, health visitors and others in the field of domiciliary nursing and could also be extremely useful to relatives who are nursing patients at home.
